wellcomeml.io package¶

Submodules¶

wellcomeml.io.io module¶

Utilities for loading and saving data from various formats

wellcomeml.io.io.read_jsonl(input_file)¶

Create a list from a jsonl file

Parameters

input_file (str) – File to be loaded.

wellcomeml.io.io.write_jsonl(input_data, output_file)¶

Write a dict to jsonl (line delimited json)

Output format will look like:

` {'a': 0} {'b': 1} {'c': 2} {'d': 3} `

Parameters

  • input_data (dict) – A dict to be written to json.

  • output_file (str) – Filename to which the jsonl will be saved.

wellcomeml.io.s3_policy_data module¶

class wellcomeml.io.s3_policy_data.PolicyDocumentsDownloader(s3, bucket_name, dir_path)¶

Bases: object

Interact with S3 to get policy document texts

Parameters

  • bucket_name – the S3 bucket name to get data from

  • dir_path – the directory path within this s3 bucket to get policy data from

download(hash_list=None)¶

Download the policy document data from S3

Parameters

hash_list – a list of hashes to specifically download, if None then download all

get_all_s3_keys()¶

https://alexwlchan.net/2017/07/listing-s3-keys/ Get a list of all keys to look for pdfs in the S3 bucket.

get_hashes(word_list=None)¶

Get a list of policy document hashes from the S3 location

Parameters

word_list (list) – a list of words to look for in documents, if None then get hashes for all

Returns

a list of dicts with the file hash and the policy doc source where it is from

Return type

list

save_json(documents, file_name)¶
